```
mkdir recipes-app
cd recipes-app
```

```
npm init -y
npm install react react-dom serve
```

```
recipes-app (folder)
  > node_modules (already added with npm install command)
  > package.json (already added with npm init command)
  > package-lock.json (already added with npm init command)
  > index.html
  > /src (folder)
    > index.js
    > /data (folder)
      > recipes.json
    > /components (folder)
      > Recipe.js
      > Instructions.js
      > Ingredients.js
```
